original_title: Greatest Presidents of the United States
overview: Among the 43 former U.S. presidents, a handful of leaders stands out. This educational program highlights the achievements of the most noteworthy Americans to sit in the Oval Office, each of whom is credited with helping to establish the United States as a veritable superpower with long-reaching influence. Featured commanders in chief include Abraham Lincoln, Franklin D. Roosevelt, Harry S. Truman and John F. Kennedy.
title: Greatest Presidents of the United States
